level.heading: BRIEFS IN SUPPORT OF OR TAKING ISSUE WITH THE DECISION OF THE HEARING OFFICER§ 14-6314)

level.text: Any party may file a brief with the Chief of OFH in support of or in opposition to the hearing officer’s decision within ten (10) working days after service of the decision.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 2291, 2294 (April 3, 1992).
